summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting that materials be added to the next production in the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing discovery and evidence handling in the investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting that materials be added to the next production in the Epstein case.

events.title: Discovery Production Request
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a team to request adding materials to the next production in the Epstein case discovery process.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 28, 2021, regarding discovery in the Epstein case.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email requests that materials be added to the next production, indicating ongoing evidence handling.
The correspondence shows the procedural aspect of the legal case continuing in late 2021.
